name: Red Pants Adventure
description: Red Pants Guy... A hero with one defining quality, and I'm not referring to that beautiful bald head. Collect all 42 pieces of cheese on your way to accomplish the most fantastic feat in all of the RedPants™ extended universe, beating the game. Experience the struggle, nay, the gauntlet that is the emotional journey you are about to embark on, my friend. For only you, yes you, Darrel Hollingsworth reading this on July 3rd 2031, can truly achieve the destiny of the great beyond.
